job_history.work_description: Ability to support multiple customers via live chat simultaneously. Monitor chat and ticket queue. Escalation of tickets/chats to tier II support team when needed.

Oversee classroom operations; assist with classroom projectors and computers. Install, maintain and upgrade computer hardware, peripherals and software in the Central/Southern NAU Extended Campuses region.
Installation of television, audio and security equipment. Working with audio, video and network wiring/cabling.
Responsibly for mounting televisions, speakers/ sound bars, as well as TV/audio receivers. Required to set up wired/ wireless networking equipment and properly run cables throughout office/home.

skills.name: Technical Support
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in providing technical support to customers via live chat, and also assisted with classroom operations, computer hardware, and software maintenance, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Computer Hardware Installation
skills.explanation: Installed, maintained, and upgraded computer hardware, peripherals, and software in multiple roles, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Networking
skills.explanation: Set up wired and wireless networking equipment, and properly ran cables throughout office and home environments, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Supported multiple customers via live chat simultaneously, and escalated tickets to tier II support team when needed, showing a solid level of proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Resolved technical issues and escalated complex problems to higher-level support teams, indicating a solid working proficiency in troubleshooting.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers and team members in various roles, demonstrating a solid level of proficiency in communication.
